ActualTimeOfRestorationTitle: The power was back on at
NotesTitle: Additional notes about your power cut
UpdatesText: Let us know if you're affected
ViewOnMapText: View this power cut on a map
NoFaultMessage:
We display information with four or more properties off supply.  At the moment we're unable to find any power cuts in the area. 

If you have no supply it could be you are the first to tell us about it.  Help us get your power back on by calling 105 or 0800 195 4141.
NoCancelledPowercuts: There are currently no cancelled power cuts in our region. If your power hasn't gone off as planned or you have a questions about a planned power cut please use our contact form here or you may find the answer on our planned power cut page here.
OutsideAreaMessage: Sorry, it looks like your property is not on our network. Please contact your network operator for more information. To find your operator visit www.powercut105.com/findoperator or call 105.
NoActiveFaultsMessage:
There are no reported power cuts right now. If you have a power cut you can report it by calling 105

We're available 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
NoOutageSummaryTitle: There have been no reports of a power cut in
NoOutageSummaryDescription: If you are experiencing issues with your power, let us know so we can investigate the problem.
OutageSummaryTitle: We are sorry you are experiencing a power cut in
OutageSummaryTitleReference: We are sorry you are experiencing a power cut
OutageSummaryDescription: We are currently investigating the issue
OutOfAreaSummaryTitle: We're sorry, you are not in our area
OutOfAreaSummaryDescription: Sorry, it looks like your property is not on our network. Please contact your network operator for more information. To find your operator visit www.powercut105.com/findoperator or call 105.
TodaysPlannedWorkSummaryTitle: We have identified scheduled work happening in your area
TodaysPlannedWorkSummaryDescription: We will get your supply back on as soon as we have finished our work
FuturePlannedWorkSummaryTitle: We are undertaking planned work in your area
FuturePlannedWorkSummaryDescription: We will get your supply back on as soon as we have finished our work
ResolvedFaultSummaryTitle: Your power has now been restored
CancelledPlannedWorkSummaryTitle: Sorry we have had to cancel our planned works
CancelledPlannedWorkSummaryDescription: We will notify you by letter once we have a new date
SearchDescription: Enter your Postcode or Reference number (Using 'INC #########' and include the space e.g. INC 124233158)
OverviewDescription: Important information on the power cut in your area, please read:

Items.AdditionalFaultInfo:
This power cut has been caused by an unexpected incident with the underground cable that provides electricity to your home or business. We didn't know before your electricity went off that this was going to happen but now we know, rest assured we will get your power back on safely and as quickly as possible.

Please note that all our timescales are estimated based on previous experience and may change if new information becomes available while our engineers are fixing the issue. With underground power cuts, we may need to dig to repair the cable and this can sometime extend the length of time you are without power. Click the link to find out why power cuts happen

CTAs.Text: What to do in a power cut
I'm involved in this power cut
